price: Is this a favor that you remind me with, that you have enslaved the Children of Israel?[8]
arabic: وَتِلۡكَ نِعۡمَةٞ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنۡ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِيٓ إِسۡرَٰٓءِيلَ
footnotes: [8] i.e., If you had not been cruel to the Israelites, I should not have been brought to your house for upbringing.

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
